text: According to full GAMMA regulations, what is the upper weight limit for the Men's Bantamweight division?
feedback: The Men's Bantamweight division in GAMMA has an upper limit of 61.2 kg.

text: Which of the following actions is considered a foul under GAMMA unified rules?

options.text: Kneeing a grounded opponent to the body.
Striking the back of the head.
Using an open-hand push to the face.

feedback: Striking to the back of the head or spine is a prohibited action (foul) in GAMMA rules.
source_reference: GAMMA Regulations Document, Section A.B - Fouls

text: Competitors are allowed to wear shoes during a GAMMA regulated MMA bout.
feedback: Shoes are generally not permitted in MMA competition attire under GAMMA rules; competitors fight barefoot.
source_reference: GAMMA Regulations Document, Section C.D - Attire & Equipment
